Package model

Enum Class GameCycle

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<GameCycle>
model.GameCycle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<GameCycle>, Constable
public enum GameCycle extends Enum<GameCycle>
Enum managing different phases of Warzone Game.

Contains list 0f states and list of possible states to move from current state.

Also provides respective controller object for each state.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Enum

    Enum.EnumDesc<E extends Enum<E>>

  • Enum Constant Summary

    Enum Constants
    Enum Constant
    Description
    GameExit
    In GameExit state once all countries are conquered, ends the game.
    GameLoad
    GameLoad state handling load map, player creation and countries allocation operations
    MapBuilder
    MapBuilder state handling map creation and validation operations
    OrderExecution
    OrderExecution state allows game engine to execute provided orders
    OrderIssuance
    OrderIssuance state provides list of orders to allow all the players
    Reinforcement
    Reinforcement state handling allocation of reinforcement armies to each player after completing execute orders phase
